metadata.title: CVE-2024-47554 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption vulnerability in Apache Commons IO.The org.apache.commons.io.input.XmlStreamReader class may excessivelyconsume CPU resources when processing maliciously crafted input.This issue affects Apache Commons IO: from 2.0 before 2.14.0.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.14.0 or later, which fixesthe issue.

criterions.comment: commons-io package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
